35197.summary: Some customers in Portage la Prairie, MB are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35197.title: Mar 21 – Portage la Prairie | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Synergy North is still working to restore power to affected areas. Services will begin to come online as power is restored. Thank you for your patience.
